aka: A cross on earth and a moon in the sky
Крест на земле и луна в небе(俄)

cast.name: 佐娅·别洛赫沃斯蒂克 Zoya Belokhvostik

this_title: Крыж на зямлі і поўня ў небе
trans_title: A cross on earth and a moon in the sky
Крест на земле и луна в небе(俄)
introduction: The main character of the film is the famous Belarusian artist Vitold Byalynitsky-Birulya (1872-1957). This is not a biography of the master, but the author’s version of his life, creative and moral quests, created on the basis of biographical facts, his correspondence with his daughter. The authors of the film talk about the fate of the Belarusian intelligentsia from the end of the last century to the era of building socialism.
chinese_title: Крыж на зямлі і поўня ў небе
